Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: Accelerator Pistol, Magnum (MAcP-10)
description:
The magnum version of the accelerator pistol. The weapon fires a projectile at a low initial velocity; after it leaves the barrel, an internal charge accelerates the bullet to greater velocities. Accelerator weapons have low recoil and are well adapted to zero-G environments.

This version of the weapon uses more powerful ammunition, causes more damage, and has a longer range than the standard version.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures

name: cP859u Pistol (Staple Gun)
description:
The cP859u through x variants are designed as sidearms for non-human Imperium troop who are unable to comfortably handle standard Imperial designs. These species are usually assigned to secondary roles that do not require front-line armament. The cP859 series is designed to allow field modification so that any known species can adapt it to their special manipulative members. Features of note are the extremely large and adjustable hand guard. a trigger assembly that is electrical and can be placed anywhere on the weapon, and a low recoil force so that even smaller or more fragile species can use it without harm.

The staple gun is capable of being adjusted for single shot, burst fire or autofire, or having any of these modes locked out to take species preferences into account.

sources.publication: Traveller Wiki : Staple Gun
authors: Lord (Marquis) and Master of Sophontology Maksim-Smelchak of the Ministry of Science

sources.publication: Emperor's Arsenal
